isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 6 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS SPICER PSO140-61 - REASSEMBLE

step1.para: Position the shift lever housing on edge in a vise.
Hold the shift lever so that the cross hole in the lever aligns with the rock shaft cross holes in the shift lever housing.
Insert the rock shaft through the hole in the shift lever housing and cross hole of the shift lever.
Install the rock shaft snap ring in the groove of the shift lever housing and lock the rock shaft in place.
Grease lightly and assemble new seal to shift lever housing. Grease inner wall of the lever cover and slide over the lever into position on the shift lever housing.
Assemble the spring, spring retainer, and boot over the shift lever. Depress the spring retainer and insert the pin through the hole in the lever.
Place shift lever and dome assembly on the shifter housing with gasket, noting that the finger enters the neutral position notches.
Secure with six bolts and lockwashers. Tighten to 25 to 41 ft-lbs. (34 to 56 N•m).
